statements: SELECT * FROM spacecraft_parts ORDER BY part_name DESC;
SELECT part_name, part_quantity FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE part_quantity > 5;
SELECT part_id, part_name, part_location FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE part_quantity < 10 ORDER BY part_id;
SELECT * FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE part_location = 'Bay Area';
SELECT part_name FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE part_quantity BETWEEN 3 AND 8 ORDER BY part_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE part_quantity > 10 ORDER BY part_name DESC, part_quantity ASC;
SELECT part_name, part_quantity FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE part_location = 'Lab A' OR part_location = 'Lab B' ORDER BY part_quantity DESC, part_name ASC;
SELECT part_name, part_location FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE part_quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY part_location ASC, part_name DESC;
SELECT MAX(part_quantity) AS max_quantity, MIN(part_quantity) AS min_quantity FROM spacecraft_parts;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_parts FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE part_quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM spacecraft_parts;
SELECT part_name, quantity, location FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT part_name, part_description FROM spacecraft_parts ORDER BY part_name ASC;
SELECT component_name, component_description, cost FROM spacecraft_components WHERE cost < 500.00;
SELECT * FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE last_maintenance_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY part_id DESC;
SELECT part_name, location FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE last_maintenance_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY part_id ASC;
SELECT part_name, quantity, location FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE part_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND quantity >= 5 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT component_name, cost FROM spacecraft_components WHERE cost < 1000 ORDER BY cost ASC, component_id DESC;
SELECT part_name, part_description, location FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE location LIKE '%hangar%' ORDER BY part_id;
SELECT * FROM spacecraft_parts;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT component_name, location FROM components ORDER BY component_name DESC;
SELECT maintenance_date, technician_name FROM maintenance_logs WHERE part_id = 2;
SELECT part_name, quantity, part_number FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT * FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY part_name ASC;
SELECT part_name, part_number FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE quantity <= 5 ORDER BY part_number DESC;
SELECT c.component_name, p.part_name, p.quantity FROM components c JOIN spacecraft_parts p ON c.part_id = p.id WHERE c.location = 'Outer Space';
SELECT m.technician_name, m.maintenance_date, p.part_name FROM maintenance_logs m JOIN spacecraft_parts p ON m.part_id = p.id WHERE m.maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT p.part_name, SUM(p.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM spacecraft_parts p JOIN components c ON p.id = c.part_id GROUP BY p.part_name HAVING total_quantity > 50 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE part_type='Engine';
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE part_type='Fuel';
SELECT part_name, part_type, quantity FROM spacecraft_parts ORDER BY part_type DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT part_name, location FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE location='Warehouse' AND quantity > 10;
SELECT part_name, part_type FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15;
SELECT * FROM spacecraft_parts;
SELECT part_name, part_type, quantity FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT component_name, serial_number, condition FROM spacecraft_components WHERE location = 'Storage';
SELECT * FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE part_type = 'Engine';
SELECT maintenance_date, maintenance_type, technician FROM maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM spacecraft_parts;
SELECT part_name, part_category FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT component_name, component_type FROM spacecraft_components WHERE component_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts;
SELECT * FROM spacecraft_parts;
SELECT part_id, part_name, quantity FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY part_name DESC;
SELECT component_name, component_type, component_status FROM spacecraft_components WHERE component_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
